import { useState } from "react" import LatticeVector from "./LatticeVector" export default function LatticeVectorsControl() { const [latticeVectors, setLatticeVectors] = useState([]) console.log(latticeVectors) var addLatticeVector = () => { console.log("creating vectors") let newVs = [...latticeVectors] newVs.push([0,0,0]) setLatticeVectors(newVs) } return(
Lattice Vectors {latticeVectors.map((idx, elem) => )}
) }
